title: Finding and Choosing Libraries for C++
content: I've been wondering how to choose from what seems like a huge assortment of external C++ libraries. How do people choose what's best for them?     	I know I need a 2D graphical library for my game, but I'm unsure what else could be useful. Is there an easy way to see what's available?
